[B][COLOR lawngreen]• [B][COLOR white] I 24 NEWS FR[/B][/COLOR] "$doregex[getUrl]$$lsname=I24 FR (HTTP source #05)
getUrl #$pyFunction import re,requests def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): url=re.findall('"play":"(.*?)"',page_data)[0].replace('\\','')+'?format=hls&language=fr' return requests.get(url,headers={'Referer':'http://playtv.fr/television/i24-news/','X-Requested-With':'XMLHttpRequest'}).json()['url']+'|User-Agent=iPad&Referer=http://playtv.fr/television/'
http://playtv.fr/television/i24-news/ $$lsname=I 24 NEWS FR (HTTP source #05)" https://raw.githubusercontent.com/teamblue65/LOGO/master/I24NEWS.png

[B][COLOR lawngreen]• [B][COLOR white] TPA 1[/B][/COLOR] "$doregex[get=URL]|User-Agent=iPhone$$lsname=TPA 1 (HTTP source #05)
get=URL #$pyFunction import requests, re def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = 'http://livestream.com/accounts/1181452/events/5141181'): headers = {'User-Agent': 'iPhone','Referer': 'http://livestream.com/'} source = requests.get(url, headers=headers) m3u8 = re.findall('smil[",\']\W[",\']m3u8_url.+?([^\"]+)[",\']\W', source.text)[0] return m3u8 + '|headers'
$$lsname=TPA 1 (HTTP source #05)" https://raw.githubusercontent.com/teamblue65/LOGO/master/TPA.png
